title: Kevin Volland | MLSsoccer.com
snippet: Kevin Volland is a young right winger scored 11 goals and assisted on 9 others in the Bundesliga this season. He is the captain of the Under-21 German national team. ... title: Kevin Volland - Wikipedia
snippet: After starting his football career with FC Thalhofen, Volland transferred to FC Memmingen's C-Youth squad, playing in the Bavarian League, the top amateur division at that time. After relegation in 2006, he moved on to TSG Thannhausen, in order to remain in the higher division.

title: Kevin Volland Soccer Stats & News
snippet: ANALYSIS Volland will leave Union Berlin after two years at the club and four goals scored across all competitions.
